text:
@GOP @realDonaldTrump Y'all better start thinking about the families of those that have died already.#COVID19

Americans have this thing called revenge.

Ask UBL.

If I was a Republican who stood by & let this all happen & think the living will forget?

Grief will turn 2 hate?

I'd be worried.
